content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All benefits set out below are subject to certain eligibility conditions, the terms of any EPAM policies in force from time to time, your employment contract and the terms of the relevant insurance policies in place from time to time. Unless otherwise stated, all benefits set out below are non-contractual and EPAM reserves the right to vary, replace or discontinue any benefits provided or change the provider or the terms on which they are provided from time to time.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":1551984,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6cb19b45-f02a-490d-9f39-7fe01ea714ea/Benefits_for Candidates_EPAM DIGITAL_AUG_2022.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6cb19b45-f02a-490d-9f39-7fe01ea714ea/Benefits_for Candidates_EPAM DIGITAL_AUG_2022.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Benefits_for Candidates_EPAM DIGITAL_AUG_2022.pdf\",\"name\":\"Benefits_for Candidates_EPAM DIGITAL_AUG_2022.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"6cb19b45-f02a-490d-9f39-7fe01ea714ea\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
